scripts.clean: rm -rf build/@types build/drivers build/enums build/test build/app.js build/package*.json
scripts.homey-validate: npx homey app validate -p build -l publish
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build && rm -rf build/@types build/test && cp package-lock.json build/ && jq 'del(.scripts) | del(.devDependencies)' package.json > build/package.json && npm ci --production --prefix build && npm run homey-publish
